title: Deutsche Post DHL eyes further profit increase in 2018
text: March 7, 2018 / 6:16 AM / in 24 minutes Deutsche Post DHL eyes further profit increase in 2018 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read DUESSELDORF (Reuters) - German postal and logistic group Deutsche Post DHL said it expected a further increase in earnings in 2018 after a 7.2 percent jump in 2017 profit, with online shopping driving demand for parcel deliveries. A worker opens a truck at a distribution centre of German postal and logistics group Deutsche Post DHL in Obertshausen, Germany June 15, 2016. REUTERS/Ralph Orlowski The group reported 2017 earnings before interest and tax (EBIT) of 3.74 billion euros (3.35 billion pounds), in line with its target of 3.75 billion, but slightly below the 3.789 expected in a Reuters poll. It said it expected EBIT of 4.15 billion euros for 2018 and forecast that would rise to over 5 billion euros in 2020. Reporting by Matthias Inverardi; Writing by Victoria Bryan; Editing by Ludwig Burger
